name: Brunei Virtual Museum
description:
Brunei Virtual Museum is a prototype 3D game application for Android phone and is now available for Windows. It is an open-air museum concept that consists of buildings from the old Kampong Ayer of Brunei Darussalam. It also contains exhibits on Brunei traditional items which are only represented by using textures because they are not yet developed into 3D models.

This project is developed as a Final Year Project (FYP) for a degree under BSc. (Hons) in Creative Multimedia.

The main gameplay language is only available in Brunei-Malay Language. The English version has not yet being developed.

Brunei Virtual Museum Survey Questionnaire
